text:
My favorite track and stage from the game. You hear this music, hang from that flying ship and swing around to ride on top, shooting noobs as you go. Then you get dropped on a bunch of huge worms, only to get eaten by one of them. It's madness!
Madness?
THIS
 IS
  VIDEOGEEAAAAMS~!!!

text:
I think I'd rather see a sequel by Black Forest Games. Even if the only connection is "they are a German developer, partly composed of people who made a classic C64 game with music by Hülsbeck".

Admittedly, I have not even played Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams yet.

text: I still own the 2 SNES Turricans. The soundtrack on the 1st game was definitely better, but there was some good music on this one as well. I particularly like the underwater stage music. The graphics on this one I felt were better and the game was much harder then the 1st.
